buyList.title: Register
buyList.content: First click the navigation bar registration button to register, you can use the phone number or email to register

buyList.title: Login
buyList.content: Log in by selecting the method used in registration

buyList.title: Recharge
buyList.content: After log in, enter my account to recharge.

buyList.title: Buy
buyList.content: After recharging, go to the bottom of the homepage and click on the product you want to buy.

buyList.title: View product prices and details
buyList.content: This page will show the product price and description of the product.

buyList.title: Buy Now
buyList.content: Click to buy now and generate a product order.

buyList.title: Bind the Certified Address
buyList.content: The authentication address is the address of the registration node. The mining revenue will be sent to the this address. Only one authentication address can be used for one order.

buyList.title: Confirm
buyList.content: If the balance is sufficient, the purchase will be successful, and the mine will be deployed within 48 hours after the payment is confirmed and start calculating the revenue.

buyList.title: Check order status
buyList.content: Click to go to the My Account > My Orders to check the order status.

buyList.title: Check revenues
buyList.content: Click on My Account > My Hash Power to check mining machine output record

buyList.title: Withdrawal request
buyList.content: Click My Account > My Account to withdraw

buyList.title: Withdrawals record
buyList.content: Click on My Account > My Withdrawal to check the status

home.title: First Ever, Mining TRUE
home.title1: First TRUE Mine in the World, with Unbeatable Hash Rate Computing Power
home.slogan: The Hash Cloud's management fee is 69 USD/Unit/Month, including electricity, handling, installation and maintenance charge.
home.slogan1: The first month's management fee is waived for the first batch of users.

list.title: Professional Team
list.content: Continue following up the latest TRUE algorithms, to improve the hash rate and reduce the energy consumption of the mining machine.

list.title: Independent Design and Production
list.content: Design, processing and production are all completed in our own factories to ensure continuous and stable supply. Guarantee exclusive supply of mining machines and ensure the user's excess profit.

list.title: Stable Operation and Management
list.content: The container for mining machine is adopted and deployed globally to ensure stable and safe computing power, with anti-attack, high efficiency, and stable network.

product.state1: $/6 months, and the management fee is paid for 6 months at a time.
product.manageState: Management Fee Waived During The Promotion Period
product.remark1: Note: If the balance is insufficient, please recharge first, then purchase.
product.remark2: Only BTC is accepted, and will be converted according to the real-time price of OKEX at the time of purchase.

choose.text: The Hash Power Service offers two options:
choose.one: The income generated by mining is distributed to the user's account every day according to the hash ratio of the user, and then transferred to the customer's personal address after being mapped. The mining revenue is determined by the user's calculation power and the distribution is fair.
choose.two: The mining machine uses the address provided by the customer to mine, and the income generated are directly entered into the address. The profit of the mining machine is highly uncertainï¼Œdue to the probability of the mining algorithm. Users have to take the risk themselves.

pay.state1: Order has been submitted, please pay as soon as possible. Order number
pay.state2: The order has been submitted successfully, please complete the payment within 2 hour, otherwise the order will be invalid.
pay.state3: The mining machine will be deployed within 48 hours after the payment is successful confirmed and start calculating the revenue
pay.xufuState: (Calculate the amount at OKEX real-time exchange rate, including transaction fee)
pay.zhanwei: Will give away a certified address if the total amount paid at the time of purchase exceeds $20,000.

register.captcha: Please enter the graphic verification code.

prompt.jump: Password has been reset and jump to the login page.
prompt.legalMobile: Please enter a valid cellphone number.
prompt.legalMail: Please enter a valid email address.
prompt.balanceLack: No Available Balance, Can not Withdraw
prompt.loginSuccess: Sign in success. Jump after 2 second.

confirmInfo.useableLack: Avail balance is not sufficient, please recharge first.
